name: Winging It (jimmytan, Wiens234, Bakaretsu)
description:
A Doodle-Jump-like platforming game where the platforms and enemies are synced to the music! You play as a fallen angel jumping back to the gates of heaven to reclaim her wings. You must avoid the monsters or Goomba stomp them in order to progress.

Controls:

A, D or Left Arrow, Right Arrow to move left or right

Space to Jump

Programming Lead: Jimmy Tan

Art and Programming: Thomas Liu

Music and FMOD: Chris Wiens
